Context:
The Angelo DelZotto School of Construction Management at George Brown College offers eight programs, including Ontario’s only four-year degree program in construction management. There is a free Entry Advising service to help match skills, background, and career goals with program options. The college has information sessions for learning about programs and having questions answered by faculty and staff. Tours are available to show around classrooms, labs, and facilities.

Programs: eight (including Ontario’s only four-year degree program in construction management)
Consultation with industry partners: yes
Location: Casa Loma campus
Faculty: experienced
Fast track into Construction degree program: available for those with a diploma
Free Entry Advising service: yes
Information sessions: yes
Tours: yes
Contact Information: 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, ask.george@georgebrown.ca
Social Media Hub: available
Subject to change without notice: yes
Program fee requirements: students are responsible for verifying
